content:
Netizen contribution
On July 9, it was reported online that an old man called a mall and asked the mall to remove a claw machine next to the cinema
He believed that the "big white goose" in the claw machine was a reflection of Russia, so the influence of "catching the big white goose" was not good, and threatened to "post it online" if it was not handled. "It has nothing to do with me if the machine was smashed by someone."
He then said that this claw machine that caught the big white goose "hurt the hearts of the Chinese people" and that he "did not want Russia to be defeated."

content: On July 10, an intentional injury case occurred in Lianjiang, Guangdong. A 25-year-old man broke into a kindergarten and stabbed people, resulting in 6 deaths and 1 injury. The suspect has been arrested.

Netizen contribution
On July 10, a fire broke out in Qianhu Miao Village, Xijiang, Qiandongnan, Guizhou. Some people jumped out of the building using bed sheets to escape.
The scenic spot staff said that this was a fire drill conducted by the government.

content:
Netizen submissions
On July 10, under a video about the People's Daily asking young people to establish a correct outlook on employment, 100,000 netizens mocked the content of the article

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Arrested! 
On July 10, Jinan Internet Police reported on the situation of "Jinan University subsidizing international students 30,000 yuan per month". It was found that Zhou (female, 34 years old) deliberately took some photos to attract attention and posted them online, causing a bad influence. At present, the public security organs have dealt with her seriously in accordance with the law.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Contributions from netizens
On July 10, in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, these two parents of their children said that their children were bullied and insulted by their classmates at school, and the school did not care. The parents said that it was because the school did not do anything about it at home, so they were forced to go to school. Hang banners at the door and put cars across the school gate

The first video was released, "The Fall of Shanhe University".
At the end of June 2023, Shanhe University suddenly became popular on the Internet.
Teacher Li, through exclusive internal submissions, brought you the story of this "Chinese Democratic Campus Utopia" and its founder "Brother Huan" during these seven days......

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Strike hard!
On July 10, the Cyberspace Administration of China issued a notice to strengthen the management of "self-media".
In addition to the management of qualifications and information authenticity,
it emphasized that "negative information cannot be collected, old news cannot be rehashed, hot events cannot be hyped, disaster accidents cannot be exploited", etc., and the profit rights will be clarified.
